Presently I am using Deciding scope and having SURT rule inside it.

I am also applying QuotaEnforcer and downloading 100 pages per host having with the use of following option.

host-max-fetch-successes: 100

But here it fetches 5 pages for all the host for a perticular domain.

But I want to download only 5 pages per domain...

Will anyone please tell me how can I achieve this.

Thanks in advance,
